lead_paragraph: Italy's 2008 Olympic 50km walk champion Alex Schwazer has been suspended after a repeat analysis confirmed he tested positive for a banned substance, his lawyer said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Former Olympic Walk Champion Schwazer Banned for Doping
headline.main: Former Olympic Walk Champion Schwazer Banned for Doping
